message: This is an agreeable comedy that's, er, easy on the eyes, and the brain.
Things I like about this movie: it
's set in Ojai, it features awesome actors in minor rules having fun (Stanley Tucci, Malcom McDowell)
Leaps of faith this movie requires: believing that someone who looks like emma stone could be ignored at her school, and that she's actually 16 though she looks 25
Lisa Kudrow is really not a very good actress
like, amanda bynes is acting circles around her, and amanda bynes is not meryl streep
lisa kudrow didn't show up until halfway through this movie, and suddenly the movie is all about her... and she sucks horribly
"oh, the bible? that's in best sellers, next to Twilight"
"should I bring the sylvia plath?" "nah, we can just stick our heads in the oven if we run out of things to talk about"
in summation: i liked Easy A, but would not put it in the pantheon of classic high school movies
once again, i will state: lisa kudrow is a terrible, terrible actress
she was awful in that HBO series that she starred in
Cool, thanks for sharing. I love Emma Stone. Great comedic acting and really easy to look at.
Definitely real easy to look at
